subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rickie Fowler, who held a two-stroke lead in the Abu Dhabi Championship in the United Arab Emirates after a third-round 65, shot a three-under-par 69 for 16-under 272 over all to take the title.
snippet: Rickie Fowler, who held a two-stroke lead in the Abu Dhabi Championship in the United Arab Emirates after a third-round 65, shot a three-under-par 69 for 16-under 272 over all to take the title.
